items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes a beautiful bride.
items.body: My daughter chose this one, everyone thought it was a much more expensive choice, many compliments! Read more
items.author: william

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for a fun wedding
items.body: Having a costume wedding for Halloween. Fit well, looks good. Feels a little fragile but for the price it is perfect for what I want it for. I just need it to hold together for a couple hours. Read more
items.author: DT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!!
items.body: This dress is so beautiful! Very affordable and the dress fit perfectly! The seller was extremely courteous and asked for custom measurements. The dress came quick! This is a good quality durable dress! The dress is very comfortable on! Ordered size 26. Purchase!!! Also to note the dress is a tad bit longer than expected, but alterations can be done! Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nothing like the picture
items.body: Dress looks nothing like the picture. From the neckline to the train. Very very disappointed Read more
items.author: Becky Gallagher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits to size just perfect Price is right
items.body: This dress is so beautiful everyone thought I spent a tun of money. My daughter was so beautiful in this dress I ordered 3 different and this a the last one and she loved it. The quality was great soft no itching anywhere. We didn't have time to trim it but she just picked it up. The weather was beautiful for a week before but the day of her wedding it rained all day and the bottom of the dress was in the mud in no time. But she was still beautiful. The next day and rest of the week sun ðŸŒž guess it's good luck to get married in the rain. Only downside wish I had something to pull it up in the back cause there is alot of drag going on. Read more
items.author: D.Tallant

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: I really like this dress. The details are really good. It looks like a very expensive dress. I was amazed by the quality of the material. Read more
items.author: KT

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress
items.body: The dress was pretty! It had an odor to it a little and you may need to upsize a little but it was very pretty for the price! It was too small for me I had to return it Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!!!!
items.body: This dress is gorgeous!! My now fiancÃ©, proposed and then we decided to get married within 6 weeksâ€¦I needed a dress and I needed it ASAP! I turned to Amazon and found this dress. I took my measurements at home, used their size chart as a guide, crossed my fingers, and placed the order (expedited shipping). When the dress arrived and I tried it on, I was stunned! It fit me like a glove and sucked me in at the waistâ€¦my sister-in-law and mom told me that it looked like I paid a couple grand on the dressâ€¦it sparkles, it flows, it looks chic, and I cannot wait for my wedding! I donâ€™t normally write reviews, but for any bride hesitating on whether or not to orderâ€¦DO IT!! You wonâ€™t be disappointed. For reference, Iâ€™m 212 pounds and 5â€™5â€ and I ordered the size 18W in ivory - perfect fit! (Note: I am altering the length of the dress, only the front as the back has a beautiful train). Read more
items.author: Vivian Armanious

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Z4 White, Z1 Light Champagne, Z4 Ivory, Z10 Ivory, Z10 White, Z4 Off White, Z15 Ivory, Z15 White, Z1 White, Z1 Ivory, Z6 White, Z5 Black, Z3 Ivory, Z3 White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
